New_Brunswick.University Behavioral HealthCare: University Behavioral Health Care (UBHC) is a provider of behavioral health (mental health and substance abuse) services, based in Piscataway, NJ. It is owned and run by Rutgers University and was formerly "University Behavioral HealthCare" run by the now-defunct University of Medicine and Dentistry of New Jersey (UMDNJ). In addition to operating an in-patient hospital, UBHC provides intensive outpatient, chemical dependency and residential programs for crisis interventions, acute, and chronic care throughout New Jersey.
